about_the_game:
Eat, grow, transform!

Voronica didn't think twice when she was offered a job as a 'removalist', but she's never thought twice in her life! Now this hungry bunny has to clear a whole house of its infestation of tiny people, and there's only one way to make sure they stay gone... Down the hatch!



But nothing is ever simple! Coupled with her own boundless appetite and total lack of impulse control, Voronica will also face a capricious boss, an overbearing tenant, his hyper-submissive wife and a surprise visit from an old friend. You will make choices, dodge dangers and form relationships. Complicating matters even further, Voronica's new "diet" has unexpected impacts on her body, and she begins to grow and change…

You are what you eat, and in this highly interactive visual novel your choices will not only affect your ending, but what you look like when you get there!

Sexy and hilarious, you will enjoy non-stop voracious play with 50 "meals" across 25 scenes, five endings (with variants), fourteen transformable forms, more than 750 full HD CGs and over 30,000 words!

"She's not a bad person, she's a bad Bunny!"

Kinks


  • Vore
  • Anal vore
  • Same size vore
  • Giantess vore
  • Hard vore (optional)
  • Unbirth
  • Feeding

  • Transformation
  • Breast expansion
  • Giantess growth
  • Belly growth

  • Macrophilia / Microphilia
  • Furry
  • Female and Male prey

content_descriptors.notes: This game focuses on  vorephillia "the erotic desire to be consumed by, or sometimes to personally consume, another person or creature" behaviour by an anthropomorphic "furry" character. There are male/female and female/female sexual relationships. Additionally there are depictions and/or references to macrophillia, microphillia, transformation, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, domination, submission, sadism, masochism.
